HomePage.title: Telos: Intelligent Agent Process Orchestration Platform
HomePage.subtitle: A modern, highly scalable platform for intelligent workflow orchestration
HomePage.description: It supports automatic task scheduling and management, adopts front-end and back-end separation and microservice architecture, and is designed for enterprise-level automation scenarios.

flowSection.triggerDesc: At the time of the 'Create User' form submission
flowSection.addToChannelDesc: Invite users to join the channel

features.title: Core features
features.frontend: The front-end is based on Next.js 15 and Shadcn UI to provide a smooth and consistent user experience.
features.backend: The backend uses the Go microservices architecture to ensure high performance and scalability.
features.communication: Supports tRPC/gRPC for type-safe and efficient service-to-service communication.
features.monorepo: Unified Monorepo management for easy dependency centralization and team collaboration.
features.deployment: The whole process is containerized and has built-in CI/CD support to ensure continuous delivery.

frontend.title: Front-end technology stack
frontend.nextjs: Next.js 15 – Implement server-side components and efficient routing with App Router.
frontend.shadcn: Shadcn UI – A library of high-quality components based on Tailwind CSS for agile development.
frontend.typescript: TypeScript – A strongly typed language that improves code robustness and maintainability.
frontend.trpc: tRPC – Frontend and backend type security API communication scheme.
frontend.zustand: Zustand – Lightweight state management for complex interaction logic.

backend.title: Back-end technology stack
backend.go: Go – Natively high concurrency, excellent performance, suitable for microservice architectures.
backend.gin: Gin/Echo – Efficient and lightweight HTTP framework for rapid API development.
backend.grpc: gRPC – A high-performance RPC framework based on Protobuf that optimizes service communication.
backend.postgresql: PostgreSQL – An enterprise-grade relational database that ensures data consistency and security.
backend.redis: Redis – Cache and task queues to improve data access efficiency.

infrastructure.title: infrastructure
infrastructure.docker: Docker – A containerized deployment solution for environment consistency.
infrastructure.kubernetes: Kubernetes – Automated cluster orchestration and elastic scaling.
infrastructure.helm: Helm – A standardized deployment and management tool for Kubernetes applications.
infrastructure.monitoring: Prometheus & Grafana – Complete monitoring and visualization.
infrastructure.tracing: Jaeger – Distributed Tracing for Service Performance Analysis.

cta.title: Are you ready to get started?
cta.description: Experience the Telos intelligent workflow orchestration platform now and boost your automation efficiency.

gsap.animation: Cool admission animations powered by GSAP!

signIn.socialLoginRemoved: Social login features have been removed

error.title: Authentication errors
error.subtitle: An error occurred during login
error.oauthSignin: The third-party login service is temporarily unavailable, please try again later
error.oauthCallback: If the login callback fails, please try again
error.oauthCreateAccount: If the account creation failed, contact your administrator
error.accessDenied: Access is denied, please check your permissions
error.verification: If the verification fails, please log in again
error.oauthAccountNotLinked: This email address is already linked to another account, please use a different login method
error.unknownError: An unknown error occurred, please try again
error.contactSupport: If the problem persists, contact technical support

hero.title: Powerful features designed for modern workflows
hero.subtitle: Everything you need to build, deploy, and scale intelligent automation

core.title: Core Function
core.subtitle: Built with modern technology, pursuing ultimate performance

frontend.title: Modern Frontend
frontend.desc: Next.js 15, combined with App Router, React 19, and Shadcn UI, provides a smooth user experience

backend.title: Go microservices
backend.desc: High-performance backend based on the Gin/Echo framework, natively supporting high concurrency

communication.title: Type-safe API
communication.desc: tRPC and gRPC implement end-to-end type safety and efficient communication

i18n.title: 18 Language Support
i18n.desc: Complete internationalization support based on next-intl, aimed at global users

deployment.title: Container-Ready
deployment.desc: Supports Docker and Kubernetes, with built-in CI/CD pipelines

monorepo.title: Monorepo architecture
monorepo.desc: Use pnpm workspaces to manage the codebase uniformly

security.title: Enterprise-level security
security.desc: JWT authentication, role-based access control, and secure API gateway

ai.title: AI Integration
ai.desc: Built-in AI agent support and intelligent workflow orchestration

data.title: Data Management
data.desc: PostgreSQL persistence, Redis caching, and real-time synchronization

workflow.title: Visual Workflow Builder
workflow.desc: Drag-and-Drop Workflow Designer Based on React Flow

free.name: Open Source Version
free.description: Suitable for personal projects and learning

pro.name: Professional Edition
pro.description: Suitable for teams and growing businesses

features.0: Includes all features of the free version

enterprise.name: Enterprise Edition
enterprise.description: Suitable for large organizations with custom requirements

features.0: Includes all features of the professional version

0.question: Is Telos really free?
0.answer: Yes! Telos is open-source and free; you can self-host and use it at no cost.

1.question: What does the professional version include?
1.answer: The professional version includes priority support, advanced analytics, team collaboration features, and custom integrations.

2.question: Can the plan be changed at any time?
2.answer: Of course! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time.

3.question: Do you support refunds?
3.answer: Yes, all paid plans support a 30-day no-questions-asked refund.

hero.title: About Telos
hero.subtitle: Building the Future of Intelligent Workflow Automation

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Telos is an open-source intelligent workflow orchestration platform designed for enterprise-level automation scenarios. We believe powerful automation tools should be accessible to everyone, whether individual developers or large organizations.

0.quote: Telos has completely transformed the way we handle workflow automation. The visual builder is extremely intuitive.
0.author: Chen Ming

1.quote: Microservices architecture makes scaling easy. We have already deployed it in multiple regions.
1.author: Jin Xiaoya

2.quote: Finally, there's an open-source solution that doesn't compromise on functionality. Highly recommended!
2.author: Zhang Wei
